```{r load packages, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

***

```{r load and tidy data}
bw_df <- read_csv("./data/birthweight.csv", col_names = TRUE)

bw_df %>% 
    mutate(
        babysex = case_when(
            babysex == 1 ~ "male",
            babysex == 2 ~ "female"),
        babysex = as_factor(babysex)) %>% 


    group_by(babysex) %>% 
    count()
```

Notes:  

-`delwt` -> convert `pounds` to metric `grams`  
-`fincome` -> cut digits at 2  
-`frace` -> convert to 6-level factor
